statement.title: Problem Description
statement.content: No matter you know me or not. Bless you happy in 2009.

statement.title: Input
statement.content:
The input contains multiple test cases.
Each test case included one string. There are made up of ‘a’-‘z’ or blank. The length of string will not large than 10000.

statement.title: Output
statement.content: For each test case tell me how many times “happy” can be constructed by using the string. Forbid to change the position of the characters in the string. The answer will small than 1000.

statement.title: Sample Input
statement.content:
hopppayppy happy
happ acm y
hahappyppy
